## ConfirmationDialogComponent.setFocus() method

Sets focus to one of buttons, if passed parameter is true then confirm button focus is set, otherwise cancelation button is set focus

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setFocus(confirmFocus?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  confirmFocus | <code>boolean</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
